zone.line: Alternating .
Exchanging Elysian brightness
With deep & dreadful night; the sea
Foams in broad billows from its' deep
Up to the rocks, & rocks & Ocean,
Onward, with spheres which never sleep,
Are hurried in eternal motion.
Michael
And tempests in contention roar
From land to sea from sea to land;
And, raging, weave a chain of power
Which girds the earth as with a band. —
A flashing desolation there
Flames before the thunders way;
But thy servants, Lord, revere
The gentle changes of thy day
Chorus of 3.
The Angels draw strength from thy glance
Though no one comprehend thee may .. .
Thy world's unwithered countenance
Is bright as on Creation's day.
